channel.title: Abouts on Philosophical Hacker
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Philosophical Hacker

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a wannabe philosophy professor turned wannabe tech entrepreneur living in Orlando, FL. I’ve spent most of my professional career writing android code (written a bit about it too, full list of posts are here), but I’ve also written quite a bit of javascript (node, react native, react, I co-ran react orlando for a couple years) and a little bit of python, go, and ruby. Now, I’m the mobile lead UniKey.
